IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_RollingForcastProcessResult' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_RollingForcastProcessResult] GO CREATE VIEW v_RollingForcastProcessResult AS -- 祖產(BASE) WITH tmpCalculateBaseResult AS ( SELECT quota.CompanyID, N'祖產(Base)' AS ForecastType, quota.WorkGroupID, quota.FinYear AS FinYear, quota.SubFinPeriodID, calResult.CalculateResult AS Amount, 7 AS OrderSeq FROM v_BaseQuotaResult quota INNER JOIN [dbo].[CalculateRollingForecastBase]() calResult ON quota.CompanyID = calResult.CompanyID AND quota.WorkGroupID = calResult.WorkGroupID AND quota.SubFinperiodID = calResult.Finperiod AND quota.FinYear = calResult.Year ), -- 預估業績 tmpEstimatePerformance AS ( SELECT calcResult.CompanyID, N'預估業績' AS ForecastType, calcResult.WorkGroupID, calcResult.FinYear, calcResult.SubFinPeriodID, ISNULL(OppMRC.Amount,0) + ISNULL(OppNotMRC.Amount,0) + ISNULL(calcResult.Amount,0) AS Amount, 8 AS OrderSeq FROM tmpCalculateBaseResult calcResult FULL JOIN v_BaseOpportunityMRCResult OppMRC ON OppMRC.CompanyID = calcResult.CompanyID AND OppMRC.WorkGroupID = calcResult.WorkGroupID AND OppMRC.FinYear = calcResult.FinYear AND OppMRC.SubFinPeriodID = calcResult.SubFinPeriodID FULL JOIN v_BaseOpportunityNotMRCResult OppNotMRC ON calcResult.CompanyID = OppNotMRC.CompanyID AND calcResult.WorkGroupID = OppNotMRC.WorkGroupID AND calcResult.FinYear = OppNotMRC.FinYear AND calcResult.SubFinPeriodID = OppNotMRC.SubFinPeriodID
), tmpPerformance AS ( SELECT ISNULL(billing.CompanyID,estimatePerformance.CompanyID) AS CompanyID, N'業績數' AS ForecastType, ISNULL(billing.WorkGroupID,estimatePerformance.WorkGroupID) AS WorkGroupID, ISNULL(billing.FinYear,estimatePerformance.FinYear) AS FinYear, ISNULL(billing.SubFinperiodID,estimatePerformance.SubFinperiodID) AS SubFinperiodID, IIF(ISNULL(billing.Amount,0) = 0,estimatePerformance.Amount,billing.Amount) AS Amount, 9 AS OrderSeq FROM v_BaseBillingResult billing FULL JOIN tmpEstimatePerformance estimatePerformance ON billing.CompanyID = estimatePerformance.CompanyID AND billing.WorkGroupID = estimatePerformance.WorkGroupID AND billing.FinYear = estimatePerformance.FinYear AND billing.SubFinPeriodID = estimatePerformance.SubFinPeriodID ), tmpAchievmentRate AS ( SELECT quota.CompanyID, N'當月達成率' AS ForecastType, quota.WorkGroupID, quota.FinYear, quota.SubFinperiodID, CASE WHEN quota.Amount = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ISNULL(performance.Amount,0) / quota.Amount END AS Amount, 10 AS OrderSeq FROM v_BaseQuotaResult quota FULL JOIN tmpPerformance performance ON quota.CompanyID = performance.CompanyID AND quota.WorkGroupID = performance.WorkGroupID AND quota.FinYear = performance.FinYear AND quota.SubFinperiodID = performance.SubFinperiodID ) -- PIVOT ALL SELECT * FROM( -- Quota SELECT * FROM v_BaseQuotaResult UNION -- Billing SELECT * FROM v_BaseBillingResult UNION -- Billing MRC SELECT * FROM v_BaseBillingMRCResult UNION -- Opportunity MRC SELECT * FROM v_BaseOpportunityMRCResult UNION -- Opportunity Not MRC SELECT * FROM v_BaseOpportunityNotMRCResult UNION -- Base SELECT * FROM tmpCalculateBaseResult UNION -- 預估業績(Estimate Performance) SELECT * FROM tmpEstimatePerformance UNION -- 業績(Performance) SELECT * FROM tmpPerformance UNION -- 當月達成率(Achievement rate) SELECT * FROM tmpAchievmentRate -- 當月累積達成率(Summary) UNION SELECT quota.CompanyID, N'當月累計達成率' AS ForecastType, quota.WorkGroupID, quota.FinYear, quota.SubFinperiodID, CASE WHEN ISNULL(quota.SummaryValue,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ISNULL(performance.SummaryValue,0) / ISNULL(quota.SummaryValue,0) END AS Amount , 11 AS OrderSeq FROM ( SELECT *,SUM(Amount) Over(PARTITION by Finyear,WorkgroupID,CompanyID,ForecastType ORDER BY SubFinPeriodID) AS SummaryValue FROM v_BaseQuotaResult ) quota LEFT JOIN ( SELECT *,SUM(Amount) Over(PARTITION by Finyear,WorkgroupID,CompanyID,ForecastType ORDER BY SubFinperiodID) AS SummaryValue FROM tmpPerformance performance ) performance ON quota.CompanyID = performance.CompanyID AND quota.WorkGroupID = performance.WorkGroupID AND quota.FinYear = performance.FinYear AND quota.SubFinperiodID = performance.SubFinperiodID ) t PIVOT( MAX(Amount) FOR SubFinPeriodID IN ([Period01],[Period02],[Period03],[Period04],[Period05],[Period06],[Period07],[Period08],[Period09],[Period10],[Period11],[Period12]) )FinalResult UNION SELECT CompanyID, N'預估Base調整' ForecastType, WorkgroupID, Year AS FinYear, 6 AS OrderSeq, Period01, Period02, Period03, Period04, Period05, Period06, Period07, Period08, Period09, Period10, Period11, Period12 FROM LUMManualForecastAdjustment
